summary.span: 命名空間包含介面和結構，為獨立更新之元件間的通訊提供基礎。

span.span: The namespace contains interfaces and structures that provide the basis for communication between components that are updated independently.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 命名空間會定義一組介面和結構，可供獨立更新元件，例如應用程式和增益集，來進行通訊。The namespace defines a set of interfaces and structures that can be used by independently updated components, such as an application and an add-in, to communicate. 元件可以使用介面和結構跨處理序通訊的命名空間或應用程式定義域界限，或與相同的程序或應用程式定義域中的其他元件通訊。Components can use the interfaces and structures in the namespace to communicate across process or application domain boundaries, or to communicate with other components in the same process or application domain. 中的介面命名空間也稱為合約。The interfaces in the namespace are also called contracts. 所有合約都衍生自介面。All contracts derive from the interface. 目的所可建立使用.NET Framework 的元件就類似於目的，`IUnknown`介面可建立使用 COM 元件The purpose that serves for components created using the .NET Framework is similar to the purpose that the `IUnknown` interface serves for components created using COM. 若要判斷物件是否實作特定的合約，元件會使用方法。To determine whether an object implements a particular contract, components use the method. 並命名空間包含額外的合約，以補充命名空間。The and namespaces contain additional contracts that supplement the namespace. 命名空間包含元件用來存取型別資訊，並叫用型別成員的合約。The namespace contains contracts that components use to access type information and invoke type members. 命名空間包含定義集合的合約和物件。The namespace contains contracts that define collections of and objects.
